column5: Private Balcony with gorgeous river view!! This 2 bedroom/1 bath condo sleeps 6 guests comfortably (4 Adults, 2 Children). The unit has 2 Queens and 1 Sleeper. The unit is fully furnished and includes towels, linens, cookware, washer/dryer, dishwasher, flat screen TV in living area, DVD player, FREE WIFI, and more! Enjoy the private access to the Comal River or walk across the street to the famous Schlitterbahn Park.
column8: Comal River Access and Walking Distance to SCHLITTERBAHN - Inverness 212
